RelatedActivityType.name: Parent
RelatedActivityType.description: An activity that contains sub-activities (sub-components) which are reported separately to IATI

RelatedActivityType.name: Child
RelatedActivityType.description: A sub-activity (or sub-component) that sits within a larger activity (parent) which is also reported to IATI

RelatedActivityType.name: Sibling
RelatedActivityType.description: A sub-activity (or sub-component) that is related to another sub-activity with the same parent

RelatedActivityType.name: Co-funded
RelatedActivityType.description: An activity that receives funding from more than one organisation

RelatedActivityType.name: Third Party
RelatedActivityType.description: A report by another organisation on the same activity you are reporting (excluding activities reported as part of a financial transaction - e.g. provider-activity-id or a co-funded activity, using code 4)
